Configuring Permissions¶

Before you start using MCTennis on your server, you should also configure the permissions for your players.

Admin¶

These are the recommend permissions for administrators or moderators.

Description

Permission

Allows to create, modify and delete games.

mctennis.command.edit

Users¶

Description

Permission

Allows to use the /mctennis command

mctennis.command

Allows to play games

mctennis.command.play.*
